title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct user research and gather feedback from stakeholders.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data model, application logic, and user interface components. The architecture should be modular, scalable, and maintainable, with clear separation of concerns. Consider security, performance, and error handling aspects. Provide documentation for the architecture and design patterns used.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user data, strengths assessments, and related information.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the server-side logic for handling user authentication, data processing, and integration with external services.

title: Frontend Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the StrengthsAmplifier tool, including the strengths assessment and results visualization.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the application adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant data privacy regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for functional, performance, and usability testing. Ensure the application meets quality standards.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, configure continuous integration and delivery pipelines, and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, administrators, and end-users. Establish a support system for user inquiries and issues.
